segments.text: Hi , Monica , how is everything going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything goes well , but I am thinking about quitting my current job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? You â€™ re not satisfied anymore ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just sense . But I cannot grow anymore . My boss is not really supporting me . I am interested in some positions in other JV companies , but I need to do some more in-depth research before I send my application letters out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is important . Doing research on a company you are interested in will definitely help your application .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , it is very nice talking with you . But I really have to go now . Catch you later .
segments.speaker: S2
